subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Newtown, Conn, Shooting (2012)
Gun Control
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The National Rifle Association’s sponsorship of a Sprint Cup event was negotiated by the race’s host, Texas Motor Speedway, but the decision has put Nascar in the center of the gun control debate.
snippet: The National Rifle Association’s sponsorship of a Sprint Cup event was negotiated by the race’s host, Texas Motor Speedway, but the decision has put Nascar in the center of the gun control debate.
